statements: CREATE TABLE Utilities.categories ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, name STRING )
CREATE TABLE Utilities.products ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, name STRING, category_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES Utilities.categories(id) )
CREATE TABLE utilities.electricity_meters (id INT PRIMARY KEY, meter_number VARCHAR(255), location VARCHAR(255), installed_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE utilities.water_meters (id INT PRIMARY KEY, meter_number VARCHAR(255), location VARCHAR(255), installed_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE utilities.gas_meters (id INT PRIMARY KEY, meter_number VARCHAR(255), location VARCHAR(255), installed_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE Tool(id INT PRIMARY KEY, name STRING, description STRING, quantity INT)
